document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">shun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">because </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">prize </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Face </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Lest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">sight's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">ineffable </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">disgrace </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Adoration </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">stain </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: We shun because we prize her face
